document.full_text: egypt's former president hosni mubarak is still in hospital in the red sea resort of sharm el-sheikh and his health is "unstable," a medical source said on wednesday.
document.title: mubarak still in hospital, health "unstable": source
lines_and_colors: egypt's former president hosni mubarak is still in hospital in the red sea resort of sharm el-sheikh and his health is "unstable," a medical source said on wednesday.
